code: import React from'react';import'./TeamCard.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TeamCard=_ref=>{let{team}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"team-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"team-card-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Team ",team.team_id]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"team-size-badge",children:[team.team_size," member",team.team_size!==1?'s':'']})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"team-card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"team-section-title",children:"Research Focus:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"team-topics-container",children:team.team_research_areas.map((area,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"team-topic-tag",children:area},idx))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"team-section-title",style:{marginTop:'1rem'},children:"Members:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"team-members-list",children:team.members.map((member,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"team-member-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"team-member-name",children:member}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"team-member-topics",children:team.member_fields[member].map((field,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"team-field-tag",children:field},i))})]},idx))})]})]},team.team_id);};export default TeamCard;
